SCTX:
Begin replenishammoShock

short isdead

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( isdead== 1 )
	return
endif

;when killed, adds 5 darts to inventory for player to find. so player finds 5 plus whatever is left
If ( OnDeath == 1 )
	additem "centurion_projectile_dart_shock" 5
	set isdead to 1
endif

;if 1 dart left in inv, adds 5 more
If ( GetItemCount "centurion_projectile_dart_shock" < 2 )
	additem "centurion_projectile_dart_shock" 5
endif

End
